Package java_quetico_trip_planner

Class Summary
DbCanoe DB Canoe This class abstracts the canoe database for use as an object
Driver Driver Main driver class
FilterJDialogWriteTrip Filter JDialog Write Trip Overides methods in the FileFilter class in order to restrict selection of certain file types.
JDialogMaintainCanoes JDialog Maintain Canoes A dialog to maintain the canoes available for a trip
JDialogMaintainTrip Trip Information JFrame This dialog will allow the user to input trip information and calculate the total cost of the trip.
JDialogSelectCanoes Canoe Selection JFrame This dialog will allow the user to select which canoe types they would like to use during their trip.
JDialogWriteTrip JDialog Write Trip Shows a file chooser dialog for the user to select where they would like to store the trip information summary.
JFrameSplash Splash JFrame This dialog will display a graphic and a menubar which allows you to navigate to other areas of the trip planner.
TripInformation Trip Information A singlton class for storing trip information through this application.
VerifierAdults Adults Verifier Verifier to check if adults field is valid
VerifierEndDate Start Date Verifier Verifier Verifier to check if group leader field is valid
VerifierGroupLeader Group Leader Verifier Verifier to check if group leader field is valid
VerifierStartDate Start Date Verifier Verifier Verifier to check if group leader field is valid
VerifierTotalGuests Total Guests Verifier Verifier to check if group leader field is valid
